thread.section_title: Hotel Duette - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A cozy hotel in the 17th arrondissement
thread.title_full: A cozy hotel in the 17th arrondissement - Review of Hotel Duette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Francesco F
title: A cozy hotel in the 17th arrondissement
text:
I spent a couple of days in this hotel on a business trip.
The room was not large (as usual in Paris) but it was comfortable and clean and furnished with a modern taste.
The staff was very kind and the breakfast was great.
The position is wonderful.
I would definitely recommend it for a business trip to Paris.
